ChangeList.Description: Added support for the policy-based application permission of `DataLossPrevention.Read.All` to the read operations of the DataLossPrevention policies of [user](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.

Added support for the policy-based delegated permission of `DataLossPrevention.Read` to the read operations of the DataLossPrevention policies of [user](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.

Added support for the policy-based application permission of `InformationProtectionConfig.Read.All` to the read operations of the information protection configuration policies of [user](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.

Added support for the policy-based delegated permission of `InformationProtectionConfig.Read` to the read operations of the information protection configuration policies of [user](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.
